text: Tadeusz Leszek Pluciński (25 September 1926 – 23 April 2019) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than 40 movies and television shows from 1951. He was born in Łódź, Poland. He starred in Warsaw Premiere (1951), Westerplatte (1967), Stawka większa niż życie (1967) and the comedy series Czterdziestolatek (1974–1977). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Actors from Łódź Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish radio actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish television actors
title: Tadeusz Pluciński
